div.ab:
“There stood a Horse sumptuously ornamented
with Purple and Gold, who, bold and superb,
bit his bridle until foam came from his mouth.
Then at last came Dido,
a gilded diadem in her fine hair,
And beautifully colored silk clothes,
Under an exquisite Sidonian Cloak

19. …and carrying, among other things, a golden Quiver.”
No more than one wishing to depict the boasting Croesus
when he would proudly impress Solon
with the abundance of his fortune,
showing him clothes, jewels and treasures.
Since it is noticeable that gold highlights on flat areas
make a dark effect instead of glittering,
it is best to accomplish this with colors.
right-middleGold highlights on flat areas look dark.

20. Using Gold to represent Gold is not justified,
for it will fit poorly within the picture,
although in the past it was wasted a great deal.
But there is nothing to despise, and much to praise,
In ornamenting with Gold
on the frames, borders and edges, above and below,
with masks, arabesques, curled ribbons, and gilding.

21. Gualterus Riverus, a very learned man,
wished a painting, done with skill by expert hands,
to be not only framed in gold,
but further enhanced with precious stones.
This is right and good. In his writings, he considers
such a piece to be well-painted,
but he did not tolerate that gilding
was also on the painting itself.
right-middleThat one can ornament the outside of a well-made Painting without too much cost.

22. Next to Gold, among all the metals,
Silver has the proper principal place
for its value and its beauty, glittering
with pure gleams. It would take a long time
to recount what God, in his Law,
had everyone make in His honor.
But see what Silver signifies: because it is like white,
it indicates innocence and purity without sin.
right-middleOn Silver, which is perceived as white, and what it means. right-middleExodus 36 [:24-25, 30] right-middleExodus 38 [:23, 26]

23. Such was the pure Lamb, full of honor,
white, chosen among thousands for its beauty;
its garments from Tabor gleaming white as snow,
The Angels of the Lord appeared in white.
The pure Truth of the just
Was clad all in white. And above all,
Our eyes always love to behold innocent Youth
Women and Maidens clad in white.
right-middleCanticles 5 [:10] right-middleMark 9 [:3] right-middleActs 1 [:10]
